LanguageData.SleepDisturbed.stages.0.label: disturbed sleep
LanguageData.SleepDisturbed.stages.0.description: I was disturbed during sleep by people moving around nearby. A private room would solve this.
LanguageData.AteRawFood.stages.0.label: ate raw food
LanguageData.AteRawFood.stages.0.description: I had to eat raw food. Can't we cook it, or at least synthesize some nutrient paste?
LanguageData.AteNutrientPasteMeal.stages.0.label: ate nutrient paste
LanguageData.AteNutrientPasteMeal.stages.0.descriptio: I had to eat nutrient paste. I know it keeps you alive, but nobody wants to swallow that glop.
LanguageData.AteFineMeal.stages.0.label: ate fine meal
LanguageData.AteFineMeal.stages.0.description: I ate a really tasty fine meal. Yum!
LanguageData.AteLavishMeal.stages.0.label: ate lavish meal
LanguageData.AteLavishMeal.stages.0.description: That lavish meal was amazing. It nourished my body and my soul.
LanguageData.AteHumanlikeMeatDirect.stages.0.label: raw cannibalism
LanguageData.AteHumanlikeMeatDirect.stages.0.descript: I ate the meat of another human, raw, like an animal. This is a nightmare.
LanguageData.AteHumanlikeMeatAsIngredient.stages.0.de: I ate a meal made from the meat of another human. This is horrible.
I ate the meat of another human, raw, like an animal. It was so... succulent.
LanguageData.AteHumanlikeMeatAsIngredientCannibal.sta: I ate a meal made from the meat of another human. So pleasurable. If only I had some fava beans and a nice chianti.
LanguageData.ButcheredHumanlikeCorpse.stages.0.label: butchered humanlike
LanguageData.ButcheredHumanlikeCorpse.stages.0.descri: I just butchered someone up like an animal.
LanguageData.AteWithoutTable.stages.0.label: ate off the ground
LanguageData.AteWithoutTable.stages.0.description: I had to eat a meal off the ground. Can't we get a table around here?
LanguageData.ObservedLayingCorpse.stages.0.label: observed corpse
LanguageData.ObservedLayingCorpse.stages.0.descriptio: I saw a dead body laying on the ground.
LanguageData.ObservedLayingRottingCorpse.stages.0.des: I saw a rotting corpse laying on the ground. It was disgusting.
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathAlly.stages.0.label: witnessed ally's death
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathAlly.stages.0.description: I saw one of my people die. They were alive one moment, and dead the next.
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathStranger.stages.0.label: witnessed stranger's death
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathStranger.stages.0.descript: I saw someone die. They were alive one moment, and dead the next.
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathStrangerBloodlust.stages.0: I saw someone die! That was intense!
LanguageData.KilledHumanlikeBloodlust.stages.0.label: killed someone
LanguageData.KilledHumanlikeBloodlust.stages.0.descri: I killed someone! What a rush!
LanguageData.BattleWounded.stages.0.label: wounded
LanguageData.BattleWounded.stages.0.description: That's my blood! I've been wounded in a fight!
LanguageData.NewColonyOptimism.stages.0.label: new colony optimism
LanguageData.NewColonyOptimism.stages.0.description: We just landed here. It's a tough situation, but I'm excited to be founding a new colony.
LanguageData.NewColonyHope.stages.0.label: new colony hope
LanguageData.NewColonyHope.stages.0.description: I'm getting used to this, but it's still an exciting new situation. I hope this works out...
LanguageData.SleptOutside.stages.0.label: slept outside
LanguageData.SleptOutside.stages.0.description: I had to sleep outdoors without any protection from the elements.
LanguageData.SleptOnGround.stages.0.label: slept on ground
LanguageData.SleptOnGround.stages.0.description: I had to sleep on the ground like an animal.
LanguageData.SleptInCold.stages.0.label: slept in the cold
LanguageData.SleptInCold.stages.0.description: I had to sleep in the cold. We really need some heaters.
LanguageData.SleptInHeat.stages.0.label: slept in the heat
LanguageData.SleptInHeat.stages.0.description: I had to sleep in unbearable heat. Can't we have air conditioning?
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerSold.stages.0.label: a prisoner was sold
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerSold.stages.0.description: This colony sold a prisoner into slavery. That's a worrying thought.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.0.label: someone put to death
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.0.description: A prisoner or guest was put to death.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.1.label: someone was executed
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.1.description: A prisoner or guest was killed in cold blood. This colony seems more evil by the day.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.2.label: organ harvested and killed
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.2.description: A prisoner or guest died because the colony took body parts from him. It's horrible.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.0.label: colonist put to death
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.0.descriptio: A colonist was put to death.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.1.label: colonist was executed
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.1.descriptio: A colonist was killed in cold blood. This colony seems more evil by the day.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.2.label: colonist's organ harvested, killed
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.2.descriptio: A colonist died because someone took body parts from him. It's horrible.
LanguageData.KnowGuestOrganHarvested.stages.0.label: someone's organ harvested
LanguageData.KnowGuestOrganHarvested.stages.0.descrip: The colony took body parts from a guest or prisoner. It's horrible, breaking someone down for parts when they have no choice.
LanguageData.KnowColonistOrganHarvested.stages.0.desc: Someone took body parts from a colonist. It's horrible, breaking someone down for parts when they have no choice.
LanguageData.MyOrganHarvested.stages.0.label: my organ harvested
LanguageData.MyOrganHarvested.stages.0.description: The colony harvested body parts from me! They're breaking me down like an old engine!
LanguageData.WasImprisoned.stages.0.label: was imprisoned
LanguageData.WasImprisoned.stages.0.description: The colony had me in jail for a while, like a caged animal.
LanguageData.PrisonerFriendlyChat.stages.0.label: convinced by warden
LanguageData.PrisonerFriendlyChat.stages.0.descriptio: That warden and I had a talk about the colony. It sounds like a good place...
LanguageData.SocialTalk.stages.0.label: had social chat
LanguageData.SocialTalk.stages.0.description: I had a good chat with someone.
LanguageData.AbrasiveTalk.stages.0.label: had an unpleasant chat
LanguageData.AbrasiveTalk.stages.0.description: Someone was rather abrasive towards me.
LanguageData.GreenThumbHappy.stages.0.label: sowed a plant
LanguageData.GreenThumbHappy.stages.0.description: What the world needs is more plants!
LanguageData.Catharsis.stages.0.label: catharsis
LanguageData.Catharsis.stages.0.description: What just happened... That wasn't me. I know I can do better.
LanguageData.Nuzzled.stages.0.label: nuzzled
LanguageData.SomeoneBuriedInSarcophagus.stages.0.desc: This colony buried someone in an ornamented sarcophagus. May his soul rest in peace.
